channel.title: Exospawn 617 Eco New Sever all active players!
channel.description:
Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/to7nmq7v8n7ydkg/ExoSpawn%20PK.jar
Hello everyone! Welcome to Exospawn PvP.
Over 20+ Pvm teles Including Nomad armadyl Bandos Saradomin Nex Corp KBD Tormented demons Barrows Brimhaven dugeon Dragons Rock crabs Glacors Jadinko lair tzhar volcano polypore dungeon Slayer tower lv 1 lv 2 lv 3 Revenants Bork Mith dragons Wild wyrm +More
Skilling teles Woodcutting Dung Runecrafting Agility Fishing Cooking +More
The server is a 667 with older item graphics added (like the normal dh and normal metal armor such as rune)
There are many features. All sorts of PvM from barrows to jad and even revs, 14 working skills, many types of currency including PkP Tickets and Dungeoneering Coins, and more!
Combat is perfect. PvP and PvM are great because of the awesome combat system.
when 10 players are on at once for the first time(and the owner is on), there will be a drop party with rares and many valuables!
Fully working ags , dbow ,dclaws , all godswords specs!
unique starter kit
Eco based sever now
custom pvm and pkp shops!
This is a rather new server. Please invite any friends and try to get players when you can.
PLEASE DO NOT BEG FOR STAFF , but we are looking for all staff positions
Owner
Exotiic
Co Owner
Famed
Admins
None
Mods
None
Player support
revolter
